original_title: Přenesení kolébky Františka Palackého z Hodslavic na Výstaviště
overview: In front of a pavilion at the Fairground in Prague have yeomanry a parade of horse riders in folk costumes. In the front there are a lady wearing a white hat with feathers, man and wife holding hands. Follows the procession of little queens (little girls in folk costumes). The queen is under a canopy. The exhibition visitors are watching the procession.
title: Escorting the Cradle of František Palacký from Hodslavice to the Prague Exhibition Grounds
